You also need to update the mvc plugin tests(not just UT), read the last section of plugin dev doc, that is about testing the agent in the real env. Then after this is OFF in default, you need to enhance that case, enable header collection and make tests passed.
Currently, as the default ON, the Spring related plugin tests will be failure.
